backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a DeFi protocol that tracks ICP burn events and manages Disintegrate token balances, providing queries for balances, burn history, and a claimTokens function that awards 1 token per burn.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module with a run function that currently performs no-op data migration, prepared for future schema extensions.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend TypeScript/React components, hooks, and configuration files describing the UI structure and functionality of the burn interface application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes using OKLCH color space for cyberpunk-themed styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Disintegrate DeFi Protocol application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping the application with ThemeProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, Layout, and rendering BurnInterface and BurnHistory components with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/BurnAnimation.ts: Animated component displaying ICP burn icon with particle effects, pulsing glow rings, and status text that activates during burn operations.
frontend/src/components/BurnHistory.tsx: Table component displaying burn transaction history with timestamps, ICP amounts, and Disintegrate tokens earned, including total summaries for both metrics.
frontend/src/components/BurnInterface.ts: Primary burn interface with ICP address display and copy functionality, amount input field, burn button, and integration with TokenBalanceDisplay and BurnAnimation components using Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing cyberpunk-themed header with animated background, gradient overlays, grid pattern, and footer with copyright information.
frontend/src/components/TokenBalanceDisp: React component that displays the user's Disintegrate token balance with a cyberpunk-styled card UI, showing login prompt for unauthenticated users and balance information for authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, automatically invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useClaimTokens.ts: Custom React hook that handles token claiming logic, managing loading/success/error states and invalidating relevant queries after successful token claims.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity authentication provider and hook implementation that manages login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with support for delegation identity validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom React Query hooks for fetching burn history (by time and amount) and user's Disintegrate token balance from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining cyberpunk-themed color palette using OKLCH color space, custom fonts (Orbitron, Rajdhani), glow effects, and animations for the dark-mode UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with cyberpunk color palette, custom shadows, OKLCH color support, and additional plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata file describing the Disintegrate DeFi Protocol with ICP token burning mechanism, tracking one pending feature request to deploy the application to Internet Computer mainnet.
